channel.title: How do I use sources?
channel.description: How can I play a server's source that I've downloaded from the forums? (I'm new to this, so detailed help would be great!)

item.title: How do I use sources?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Wrong section man (go here), but I’ll help you anyway:
There should be a “compile.bat” file in your server’s source folder. Run that.
Now, to start up the server, open the “runserver.bat” (or whatever the batch file to run the server is called) file.
I am, of course, implying that you’ve already done the portforwarding, the setting of your environmental variables, and such. If not, check out this tutorial on how to start a server.
For you (the server owner) to connect to your server, you would run whatever client you have downloaded, and connect to your server’s IP at “127.0.0.1” (or “localhost”) on port “43594”. You could also try and use the MoparScape Webclient v4.1.

Read full topic
